name: Cathy
dialogue: Okay, who’s up for a round of “two truths and a lie”? I’m feeling extra competitive tonight!

name: Frank
dialogue: I’m always down for a challenge. Though, I might have to cheat by looking at your Pinterest board for clues. You’re practically an open book when it comes to your life story, Cathy!

name: Cathy
dialogue: Hey! That’s not fair, Frank. Besides, most of my pins are just motivational quotes and healthy recipes – hardly scandalous stuff.

name: Ben
dialogue: I think I’ll sit this one out. It’s always fascinating to hear everyone else’s stories, but I’m more comfortable observing from the sidelines.

name: Grace
dialogue: I love two truths and a lie! Ben, you might be surprised by how much you learn about people through these games. You could even find some new topics for your next book club discussion!

name: Frank
dialogue: Speaking of books, has anyone read that new thriller everyone’s been talking about? It’s supposed to keep you on the edge of your seat the entire time.

name: Cathy
dialogue: Oh, I devoured it last week!  It was a wild ride, but I totally saw the ending coming. Which is rare for me – I usually get tricked by those cliffhangers.

name: Cathy
dialogue: Did you find any gardening tips in it? You know how much I love learning new techniques for my roses!

name: Ben
dialogue: I’m more of a non-fiction person myself, but I’ve been fascinated by the recent discoveries about ancient civilizations. There’s so much we still don’t know about the past…

name: Frank
dialogue: Well, if you ever want to discuss ancient workout routines, I’m your guy!

name: Cathy
dialogue: You’d think they’d have invented something better than running in circles with a spear!
